name: Salasar Carbonic
overview:
We are manufacturing & supplying Oxygen Gas, Carbon Dioxide, Liquid Nitrogen, Nitrogen Dioxide Gas, Argon Gas, Helium Gas, Ammonia Gas, Solid Carbon Dioxide & many more. These industrial gases are checked and inspected thoroughly while being packed within appropriate containers for flawless output and quality.

Our Product Range: Argon Gas Helium Gas Ammonia Gas Solid Carbon Dioxide

Our Infrastructure: We own a well-equipped and advanced infrastructural unit developed by us, which has enabled us to carry our business operations in smooth and efficient manner. Efficient segregation of entire unit has enabled us to carry our business operations in smooth and efficient manner.

Quality: We are a quality conscious firm and our complete endeavor lie towards achieving excellence in quality for our range of traded products. The entire range of industrial gases, offered by us known for their superior quality. This ensures that the entire range products available with us are at par with the current international quality standards.

Why Us? Wide appreciation has been received by us from the clients by serving them in an appropriate manner. Customized solutions are provided by us and we try our best to meet the individual demand of each client.
